name: Untitled RPG Game (BhelFleon)
description:
While sneaking through the castle in an atempt to make yourself a few easy coins a malevolent curse befalls the place. Now you must gather your wits and use whatever tools are available in order to find a way out and escape.

The game, currently with no decided title, is an action RPG where you take the role of a sly rogue who finds himself trapped inside a castle that was hit by a curse, by making use of unique weapons found trhoughout the place, each with it's own set of abillities, you must fight the various enemies roaming the place and make your way out.

Meant as a learning project with the main objective of serving as a prototype for a possible future commercial project, the demo is comprised of a small section featuring a simple movement and combat system, with plans of more different systems to be added either with an update or a complete demo overhaul, these systems being items and inventory, dialogue and quests and a better and more customizable skill system.
